Class Repository<T extends EntityObject>

java.lang.Object
repository.Repository<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity the repository manages, extending EntityObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<T>, Iterable<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentRepository, InvoiceRepository, MedicineRepository, MedicineRequestRepository, NotificationRepository, PatientRepository, PrescriptionItemRepository, PrescriptionRepository, StaffRepository, UnavailableDateRepository
public abstract class Repository<T extends EntityObject> extends Object implements Iterable<T>, IRepository<T>
Repository is an abstract class that serves as a generic repository for managing a collection of entities that extend from EntityObject. It provides methods to load, save, add, remove, update, and retrieve objects. The repository interacts with a CSV file to store and retrieve data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Repository()
    Constructor initializes the repository and creates an empty map to store entities.
